metadata.name: Savage Attitude
metadata.description:
A stunning piece of art birthed from the creative partnership between Jared Aufrichtig and Samurai Farai. This one-of-a-kind artwork, which has been brought to life through animation by Clinton Jones, serves as a testament to their unparalleled artistry. The sale of this NFT includes the original artwork, a tangible piece that remains in the possession of the NFT owner indefinitely and must accompany this NFT in any subsequent sales. Shipping prices will be calculated separately after the sale.

As an owner of this NFT, you will receive the tangible original artwork, lovingly crafted with charcoal, pastel, oil stick, and Sakura solid marker on Fabriano fine art cotton rag. The piece measures 28.5cm by 39.5cm. 

This acquisition also includes an animated digital twin, which will infuse vitality into its Metaverse existence. Thus, "Savage Attitude" not only captivates the physical world but also makes a statement in the digital realm.
